a soldier is an enlisted man or woman who serves in an army

a warior is someone engaged in or experienced in warfare, or a person habitually engaged in warfare.

(according to some quick searching for definitions aniway)

On Tue, 25 Mar 2008, alternate_dph wrote:

> What is the difference between a soldier and a warrior?
